org.onehippo.forge.content.pojo.common

Interface ContentValueConverter<V>

  • Type Parameters:
    V - physical content value type
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    DefaultJcrContentValueConverter

    public interface ContentValueConverter<V>
    Content Value converter interface.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      BinaryValue toBinaryValue(V value, String mimeType)
      Converts the value (e.g, Value) of mimeType to a BinaryValue.
      V toJcrValue(BinaryValue binaryValue)
      Converts the given BinaryValue object to a JCR Binary value.
      V toJcrValue(String typeName, String stringValue)
      Converts the given stringified value (stringValue) of the type (typeName) to a proper JCR value.
      String toString(V value)
      Converts the value to a string.

    • Method Detail

      • toString

        String toString(V value)
         throws ContentNodeException
        Converts the value to a string.
        Parameters:
        value - content data value (e.g, Value)
        Returns:
        stringified value
        Throws:
        ContentNodeException - if content node exception occurs

      • toBinaryValue

        BinaryValue toBinaryValue(V value,
                          String mimeType)
                   throws ContentNodeException
        Converts the value (e.g, Value) of mimeType to a BinaryValue.
        Parameters:
        value - content data value
        mimeType - mime type
        Returns:
        a BinaryValue
        Throws:
        ContentNodeException - if content node exception occurs

      • toJcrValue

        V toJcrValue(String typeName,
             String stringValue)
      throws ContentNodeException
        Converts the given stringified value (stringValue) of the type (typeName) to a proper JCR value.
        Parameters:
        typeName - content value type name
        stringValue - stringified content value
        Returns:
        a proper JCR value from the stringified value
        Throws:
        ContentNodeException - if content node exception occurs

      • toJcrValue

        V toJcrValue(BinaryValue binaryValue)
      throws ContentNodeException
        Converts the given BinaryValue object to a JCR Binary value.
        Parameters:
        binaryValue - content binary value
        Returns:
        a JCR Binary value
        Throws:
        ContentNodeException - if content node exception occurs
